6.135. sibl_gui.globals.uiConstants¶

uiConstants.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines sIBL_GUI package ui constants through the UiConstants class.

Others:

6.135.1. Classes¶

class sibl_gui.globals.uiConstants.UiConstants[source]¶

This class provides sIBL_GUI package ui constants.
